messages:
Happy birthday to you!
Happy birthday to you!

Happy birthday, dear %PLAYER%!
Happy birthday to you!
*munch munch munch*
Now you're an official mage, %PLAYER%!

Blowing out the candle didn't make me a
mage, Aunt Zippy!
Well, you're officially sixteen now!

I'm pretty sure I officially turned
sixteen at midnight last night.

Well, you're officially our favorite
birthday mage!
Aw, thanks, Uncle Zappy!
All right, everyone! Dig in!

How was your day, %PLAYER%?
Are you getting used to Ring Zero?

Yeah, today was pretty wild. I went around
town and fixed a lot of the stuff the Big
Bad had ruined.

I changed the color of some ether nettle
blossoms, teleported some sheep, and
impersonated a cat!

I love that the water feature in the
center of town is unglitched again. It
really feels like old times.

But then that earthquake hit. That was
like old times, too.
...Yeah, that was scary.

I guess it's a sign that the Big Bad might
be coming back.

First thing tomorrow, I'm supposed to meet
the village elders and visit the mountain
dungeon.

They're really sending you to get the
artifacts, then?

I guess so. The village elders say the
artifacts are the only thing that can stop
the Big Bad for good.

It's a lot to ask a sixteen year old, but
if Ring Zero chose you....

Well, perhaps you're exactly the right
mage for the job.

In which case we'd best get to bed soon.
You'll need a good night's rest.
Yeah.
Good night, Aunt Zippy, Uncle Zappy.

The time has come to visit the first
dungeon, %PLAYER%.
...Yeah.
Ready to go?
Yeah. I mean, no. I mean....

Wait, weren't you supposed to bring me a
book this morning? A book about the cereal
dungeon?

The serial dungeon, yes. We did have a
book about that.
But... it's gone.
Gone? You lost the book?
No, not lost! It's just missing!

But you're in charge of the library! How
did you lose a whole book?

We will keep looking for it. But first you
go.

More important for you to get started
right away.

You have demonstrated incredible
competence with what you've already done
with Ring Zero, so we are confident you
can work your way through the dungeon on
your own.

On my own? You aren't coming inside with
me?

We are not hackers and cannot pass the
gate.
Ring Zero should grant you access....
"Should?"
If I remember correctly....

You don't know? What kind of wise old men
are you?
We'll certainly see, won't we?

That book... what did it say? Can you give
me a summary at least?
I must have read it once....
Wasn't it something about...?
I don't know.
I can't remember.

Something about rooms... and magic
words....
Ho boy.

We had hoped that book would give you a
leg up, but ultimately, I doubt it was
that important, %PLAYER%.

Instead you will need to rely on XA, who
will be able to provide you with a great
deal of information.
Exay?
XA sits just inside. Is robot.

It literally has insider information about
the place.

I realize it's disappointing that we
cannot help you very much in this chapter
of your journey as a mage.

But we promise you, %PLAYER%, that you
will not be entirely on your own.
Trust us. You'll be just fine.
You will not be in danger at any point!
Unless Big Bad comes back.
Yes! And that is why you must hurry!
All right. Let's not waste any more time.
